title: General Competency Development Program for Workplace Learning Capacity Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Real-time online education aiming to strengthen language-based job competencies in digital device-provided environments

learning_goals: Learners achieve 80% or higher on formative assessment criteria for effective communication and collaboration skills in the workplace (relationship-building with others, conflict management)
Learners can demonstrate the ability to establish strategies for flexibly responding to changes in the work environment (problem-solving, adaptive thinking) through real-world case studies
Learners earn 4 or more points (on a 5-point scale) in peer feedback by demonstrating knowledge acquisition and application skills (information analysis, practical learning transfer)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
